#text=This weekend , I decided I wanted to try baking my first cake .
#text=I found a recipe online for an easy to make cake , printed out a list of the ingredients , and went to the grocery store to get them .
#text=I knew about some of the common things , like eggs , flour , and sugar , but the list helped me get a lot of things I did n't own and would n't know to get .
#text=When I got home , I followed the recipe as closely as I could , adding each of the ingredients at the exact amount of the recipe asked for .
#text=I mixed them all up as described , and put them into a pan that I had borrowed from my mother .
#text=I put the pan in the oven and let the cake cook .
#text=I checked on it occasionally to see if it was looking ok , and because I was really excited to see how it was turning out .
#text=When it was done in the oven I removed it , and applied an extra thick coat of frosting .
#text=I was supposed to wait for the cake to cook , but I was too excited to try it out and ate it much sooner than recommended .
